nodes.text: Solax was a location in the galaxy. An Ithorian once sent his saliva out into the winds of Solax.

Solax was first mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical. It was later made canonical with the publishing of Musings of an Ithorian on Hyperspace.
